primevc.core.collections.IEditableList

type
interface
implements
primevc.core.traits.IEditEnabledValueObject
IReadOnlyList<DataType>

Instance Methods

add(item : DataType, ?pos : Int) : DataType

parameters
item
pos default-value: -1
returns
item
Method will add the item on the given position. It will add the item at the end of the childlist when the value is equal to -1.

move(item : DataType, newPos : Int, ?curPos : Int) : DataType

parameters
item
newPos
curPos Optional parameter that can be used to speed up the moving process since the list doesn't have to search for the original location of the item.
returns
item
Method will change the depth of the given item.

remove(item : DataType, ?oldPos : Int) : DataType

parameters
item
returns
item
Method will try to remove the given item from the childlist.

removeAll() : Void
